page.title: 03SHOALSTONE by Dawn Hamling
page.content: SHOALSTONE by Dawn Hamling Shoalstone is an OUTDOOR swimming pool in Brixham. It is next to the Breakwater Beach. It is filled by sea water every high tide. There are three life guards around the pool side. There is a very deep end and a very shallow end, the pool is painted blue inside. The pool is about 33 metres long and has lockers at the side. These are 10p each. The toilets are 2p each. There is also a shop nearby which sells sweets, coffee, tea, bait, etc. The life guards rent deck chairs to people and the Swimming Club has a small room near the lockers, but they use the indoor pool in Ranscombe Rd. for swimming. In summer the life guards clean the pool out every day but in winter it is left with stones & weed in it. .
